name: Indiemon: Thunder Region
description:
Long ago, the 5 great nations lived in peace, then the Region of Flames attacked. Our hero, Landon traveled the Earth Nation protecting it and fending off flame intruders. Now are Landon must travel to the thunder region and do the same.

Indiemon: Thunder Region After more than a year's absence, the Indiemon series returns. This time, the hero, Landon, finds himself in a new region with new Indiemon to capture.
